title: Interpretation of the dream of shame in a dream in detail

preview.html: Shyness is an emotion that afflicts a person sometimes, and it is a double-edged sword. It is praised and hated if it exceeds its limits. Seeing modesty in a dream is something many people do, but it differs in its interpretation when the dreamer’s condition, gender, and circumstances of seeing it differ from those of married and divorced women. Here we present to you the interpretation of a dream about shyness in a dream. Shyness in A dream for single people, interpretation of a dream about shyness towards people for single people, interpretation of a dream about shyness for a married woman and her. Contraction in a dream for a divorced woman. Shame in a dream. Seeing shame in a man’s dream symbolizes the weakness of the dreamer’s character, weakness, and fear in reality. Shame in a dream for a man can symbolize his failure and inability to make his own decisions. The interpretation of a dream about a woman being ashamed in a man’s dream is a worthy vision. With praise. As for seeing shame in a woman’s dream, it is good, because it symbolizes her purity, chastity, piety, commitment to her duties, and obedience. There are those who say that seeing shrinkage in a dream indicates the arrival of a great diet and abundant money to the dreamer, which makes his heart happy and improves his affairs. It can be an interpretation. A dream of shame is good news for someone who sees happiness and contentment in his life in the coming period. Shame in a dream for a woman as a result of taking off her hijab, this is a harbinger and a warning against not fully trusting others so as not to make a mistake. As for seeing shame in a single woman’s dream as a result of her nudity or not wearing her clothes, it means This symbolizes the approaching marriage or relationship. A married woman’s shame in a dream could be a sign of her being exposed to some psychological or financial crisis or many marital disputes and disagreements. As for seeing a shy child in a dream, it symbolizes good health, piety, and religious and moral commitment. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream. Seeing a preacher in a dream. Shyness in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream of shyness in a dream for an unmarried woman could be a reflection of her shyness and shyness in reality. Perhaps shrinking in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of her good morals, her piety, the nobility of her heart, the whiteness of her intention, the purity of her intention, and her peace. Shyness in an unmarried woman’s dream could be a sign that she is going through a psychological or family crisis or problem that negatively affects her psyche. Seeing shyness in a person’s dream from someone who proposes to him in a dream portends the coming of joys and happy occasions for her. Seeing shame in a dream of an unmarried woman As a result of her veil falling or her clothes falling, the girl is warned not to pay attention to her behavior and actions. Interpretation of a dream of shyness by people for individuals. As for the interpretation of a dream of shyness from people for single people, it can be referred to as gifts, blessings, sustenance, and blessings. People’s interpretation of a dream of shyness can be a sign of the fulfillment of her ambitions and desires Interpretation of a dream about people who are ashamed of being single could be a sign of hearing happy news about their relationship or marriage. Interpretation of a dream about shame for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about shame for a married woman could be a sign of her anxiety and fear of the future or the unknown. Interpretation of a dream about shame for a married woman if it is a result of Her nakedness symbolizes her fatigue and suffering

title: Interpretation of a dream about disagreement over various issues

preview.html: The dream of conflict varies depending on the situation in which the dreamer finds himself, as well as the dream of conflict according to the social situation in which the dreamer finds himself. The person who sees worries and sorrows like a dream could be an indication of the failure of the emotional or marital relationship for a single or married woman, so in the encyclopedia article we examine the most important things mentioned in the dream. Conflict. Interpretations of a dream about conflict: First: The controversy in Ibn Sirin’s dream: The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin explained the controversy in his book Interpretation of Dreams as follows: Ibn Sirin confirmed that the dispute with parents is an indication of the visionary obstructing his parents. A collision in a dream is generally a sign of Problems, anxiety and fatigue in life. Ibn Sirin interpreted conflict as being exposed to difficult and annoying situations and facing problems that are difficult to solve. Second: Quarrel in a dream for unmarried people: There are many interpretations of dreams about conflict for a single girl, and the most important information about conflict for a single woman can be found through The following: Dream interpreters have confirmed that seeing an unmarried girl quarreling with people indicates the complex problems she faces in her life, the difficulties and problems that are difficult to solve, her extreme anxiety and deep sadness. If an unmarried girl sees her fiancé or lover slapping her hand, this indicates the success of her life. Romantic relationship with this man and that she will enjoy a happy married life with him. Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi confirmed that seeing a single woman arguing or quarreling could be a sign of the failure of her romantic relationship with someone she loves or betrayal by those close to her. Third: Verbal jihad in the dream: A dream of conflict can be interpreted Verbal meaning in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman and a man is as follows: If an unmarried girl sees that she is arguing with someone verbally, this indicates the arrival of bad news and solutions to major problems and great misfortunes. If an unmarried woman sees that someone is arguing and hitting her This indicates her happy life with that person, which will end in a happy marriage. A dream about a girl’s struggle could be a sign of the loneliness and emptiness that she lives and feels, and the dream is an indication of the great anxiety that the dreamer suffers from as a result of many problems. If a married woman sees that she She quarrels with her husband and quarrels with him, this is evidence of the outbreak of a major dispute between her and her husband, and the quarrel may lead to divorce or separation. If a married woman sees that she is conflicting with her mother or with her, this is evidence that she is facing great difficulties or that there is a specific difficult problem in her life. On her. Seeing a married woman quarreling or quarreling in general indicates that she will suffer from difficulties and problems that may cause her psychological and physical exhaustion. Seeing a pregnant woman arguing indicates problems and pains that she feels during pregnancy, or the dream may be an indication that she will face difficulty in childbirth or that The newborn may suffer from poor health. If a man sees that he is arguing, this indicates problems, problems, and crises that he is going through in his life. Fourth: Interpretation of a solution

title: Whoever sees in a dream that he is peeling the skin of the palm of his hand

preview.html: Whoever sees in his dream that he is peeling the skin of his palm, we often see some dreams that we cannot interpret and we cannot understand their content, if they bring us some missionary or warning messages. From now on, there is no need to be confused, because the encyclopedia presents to you through today's article the interpretation of this dream as reported by the most famous scholars and interpreters of dreams, for the different cases that the fortune teller can find, so follow us. Interpretation of someone who saw in a dream that he was peeling the skin of his palm Our respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that human skin is one of his most valuable possessions in life. Therefore, in a dream it can be a sign of money that protects a person from poverty, or it can be a position that gives him respect and appreciation, as his home can be the one that protects him from winds and rain. Ibn Sirin mentions that skin in some cases is a sign of a person's wife and children or his health and safety, and an indication of his relationship with God Almighty. Ibn Sirin adds that skin in a dream can be a sign of patience, because it comes from steadfastness and endurance. Accordingly, any injury to the skin in a dream is a sign of harm and damage that a person may be exposed to in reality. As for seeing the skin soft or beautiful, this is a sign of the great good that a person acquires, whether with money or children, and it can be a sign of repentance from sins and sincerity For the path of God Almighty. As for peeling the skin of the palm of the hand, if it is in order to show new and strong skin, then this is good news. Changing the skin color to a dark color is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from worries and sorrows, God forbid. Interpretation of peeling the skin of the palm of the hand for an unmarried girl If an unmarried girl finds that the skin of her palm is peeling, this is a sign of the great changes that she will see in her life, whether good or bad. If peeling results in new and soft skin, then this is a sign of the goodness of her life, as she may have money or a new job. Perhaps this dream is good news for an unmarried woman that she will marry soon, God willing, and that she will have righteous offspring with her and her husband. Peeling black skin in a dream is a sign that she has gotten rid of the worries and sorrows that filled her life in reality. As for if an unmarried woman peels a bad peel, this is a sign that she will lose some opportunities or money that she had and may be a sign of her distance from God Almighty. Explanation of peeling the skin of the palm of the hand for a married woman The skin in a dream for a married woman is a sign of concealment If she finds in her dream that she is peeling the skin of her hand, then this is a sign of Revealing some secrets related to her marital life. It can also be a sign that she or her husband has been harmed or damaged, and peeling or peeling the skin in a bad way can be a sign of losing money or property and losing position and prestige. In the event that a woman peels the skin of her hand and the hand looks more beautiful and better, this is a sign of the great good that she will achieve in life and it can be a sign of pregnancy and childbirth. A woman peeling black skin in a dream is good news to get rid of marital problems and

Perhaps this dream is good news for an unmarried woman that she will get married soon, God willing, and that She will have good offspring with her and her husband. Peeling black skin in a dream is a sign that she has gotten rid of the worries and sorrows that filled her life in reality. But if an unmarried woman peels bad skin, this is a sign that she will lose some of the opportunities or money that she had, and it may be a sign On her distance from God Almighty. Explanation of peeling the skin of the palm of a married woman. Skin in a dream for a married woman is a sign of concealment. If she finds in her dream that she is peeling the skin of her hand, this is a sign of revealing some secrets related to her married life. It could also be a sign of her or her husband being exposed to harm. Or damage, and peeling or peeling the skin in a bad way can be a sign of loss of money or property and loss of position and prestige. In the event that a woman peels the skin of her hand and the hand looks more beautiful and better, this is a sign of the great good that she will achieve in life and it can be a sign of pregnancy and childbirth. A woman peeling black skin in a dream is good news for getting rid of marital problems and problems

title: Interpretation of the number 3 in a dream and the symbol of the number 3 in a dream

preview.html: The number 3 in a dream symbolizes the desired Nile and good luck, and hearing the number three in a dream is evidence that you are hearing promising and happy news, and seeing the number 3 written in a dream indicates achieving goodness and blessings. Live, and dreaming of three o’clock indicates the imminent completion of work and deeds, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the number 3 in a dream. The number 3 in a dream symbolizes good luck. The number three in a dream can indicate happy new beginnings, and whoever sees that he reads the number 3 in a dream, he will be victorious. Against enemies and deceivers, because God Almighty says: “When We sent them in two, but they refused, so the number increased.” To see yourself counting on the number 3 in a dream indicates achieving goals after a short period of hard work. Arithmetic operations on the number three in a dream indicate actions that reduce harm to the dreamer or simplify his assumptions. Seeing the number 3 combined with another number in the dream indicates To the confluence of the good. The process of being excluded from the number three in a dream shows the few losses that will be compensated for later, and whoever sees himself being excluded from the number three in the dream, his affairs and circumstances are difficult. To reach the number three in a dream, this indicates doubling income and obtaining more For the sake of living. Dividing by the number 3 in a dream indicates the distribution of the inheritance and the division of money. Whoever sees that he is dividing a number by three in a dream is righteous among people. The symbol of writing the number three in a dream. Writing the number 3 in a dream indicates a business that achieves profits and a good reputation. And whoever sees that he is writing the number Three in a dream will receive benefits as a reward for his good deeds, and a dream of writing the number 3 in a beautiful handwriting indicates that he will get a promotion at work. Writing the number three with bad writing in a dream is evidence of the opposite of a bad matter. Writing the number 3 on a piece of paper in a dream means That people will be held accountable for their mistakes. Seeing the number 3 written in a dream means achieving goodness and good health, and whoever sees the number three written on the wall in a dream is safe from his opponents and enemies. Interpretation of seeing writing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the number 3. Seeing hearing the number 3 in The dream means hearing good news, which may indicate the blessing and support that the dreamer receives from others. Hearing someone pronounce the number three in a dream is evidence of good speech and benefits the dreamer, and hearing the number 3 out loud in a dream is evidence of that. From hearing wisdom and knowledge. Dreaming of hearing the number three in the examination indicates that the time is approaching to get rid of worries and difficulties, and seeing the number 3 with another number in the dream indicates cooperation in work with what is good for the fortuneteller. Interpretation of the three o’clock in a dream: Seeing the clock turning to 3 In a dream, it means that the time is approaching the completion of work and rest. Whoever sees that he looks at the clock and there are three in the dream, he will receive food and money, and if the time on the wristwatch is 3 in the dream, this is evidence of getting rid of financial distress. That the dreamer and the dream passes through ar

title: Interpretation of the letter “chin” in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of the letter Shen in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq via the Shamloul website, mustache, saturation, veil, policeman, fat, tree, dill, hair, paralysis, sun and candle, and many other symbols and connotations related to them. Seeing them in a dream with the letter Shin, the most important of which will be included in today’s article based on Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq. The dream of Imam al-Sadiq al-Ghanim. The sheep is a symbol of marriage. The sheep in the dream of a bachelor is a sign of future marriage with him, and seeing the logo in a married man’s dream may indicate that the woman gave birth to a man, and God I know. The network in the dream of Imam Al-Sadiq. The network is a sign that the dreamer is deceived and deceived and falls into the trap of his enemy, and the dreamer must review his relationship with others, especially those close to him, and God knows best. Interpretation of the letter sin by Nabulsi. Dreams of Shin. Dreaming about Imam Al-Sadiq’s mustache. The mustache in the dream is one of the symbols that indicates a cunning man in One's LifeSeeing a man's mustache being cut off in a dream means that the dreamer maintains obedience, duties, and the Sunnah, and God knows best. Trees in Imam Al-Sadiq's dreamDreaming of a tree is one of the symbols that indicates many worries, disagreements, and quarrels in the dreamer's life with friends and relatives, and instability in family affairs, especially when they fluctuate. The leaves of these trees fall and knowledge is with God. Fat in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Dreaming of fat or fat in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate that the dreamer will obtain blessed money and the work it contains will open the doors of livelihood for him, especially when he eats fat in a dream. Hair in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. Hair in a dream according to Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq is one of the signs that carries many interpretations, including that it is a sign of longevity when seeing long hair, as well as a sign of a lot of money. Imam al-Sadiq’s dream of the sun and the sun is one of the most common symbols and signs that indicate a Lord. The family or the Lord, and whenever the sun shines and does not rise, the conditions of that person and the house appear, and God knows best. Candles in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. A candle or candle in a dream is considered a praiseworthy symbol that realizes the best conditions of the dreamer and may be close to comfort and goodness in the dreamer’s affairs, and lighting the candle in The dream is one of the symbols that indicate the nearness of comfort and the fulfillment of the dreamer’s hope and goal, God willing. Commented on the dream of Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing oneself in a dream as if he was hanged is a sign of humiliation, humiliation, scandal, injustice, and great injustice that befalls the dreamer, or exposure to rejoicing, and God knows best. A dream about the martyrdom of the Imam The truthful and the witness is a sign that the vision is praiseworthy and heralds a lot of good and blessed halal money, and an indication of the removal of worries and problems and the ability to achieve the goals of the vision in the near future, God willing. Thorns in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Thorns are unwanted symbols, indicating a person who is difficult to please or an unjust person, and a sign of spreading discord and great injustice, and God knows best. Dreaming of gray hair and your head forward is real. Graying of the head in a dream is one of the symbols.

A dream about the martyrdom of the Imam The truthful and the witness is a sign that the vision is praiseworthy and heralds a lot of good and blessed halal money, and an indication of the removal of worries and problems and the ability to achieve the goals of the vision in the near future, God willing. Thorns in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Thorns are unwanted symbols, indicating a person who is difficult to please or an unjust person, and a sign of spreading discord and great injustice, and God knows best. Dreaming of gray hair and your head forward is real. Graying of the head in a dream is one of the symbols.

title: Interpretation of dreams about worms: Seeing a worm in a dream

preview.html: A dream of worms is for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man. There are white or black worms in the hair of the house, in the feces, in the food coming out of the hand and body, and eating a worm according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of worms in a dream. Worms are enemies that appear to you, and a sign of Forbidden money, false witnesses, gossip and gossip. Seeing worms symbolizes corruption of morals and a sign of evil. Seeing black worms in a dream indicates the presence of a conspiracy, conspiracy or evidence that there are bad people in the center of your life, such as friends, acquaintances and relatives and they want to take something expensive or dear upon you. That is why they are ready to harm you. Seeing worms in clothes indicates money. Scattering worms on the body in a dream indicates the presence of many children and servants. Seeing worms eating his flesh indicates that children and religious servants are eating his money. Seeing worms coming out of the body means that fears may come. Worms emerging from the anus indicate... Grandchildren. Seeing black worms in a dream is also a sign of money spent on committing immorality and indicates evil and hateful hearts, envious spirits and insulting speech. In general, black worms in a dream are a warning to the evil person who surrounds him. Seeing worms coming out of the mouth in a dream means deception and deception that The dreamer may be exposed to it and then run away from it. Whoever dreams of eating worms, the dream may indicate envy that he is exposed to in terms of diet and living. The presence of worms in food indicates the weakness of your enemy and your fears. Worms in the bed indicate enemies from children. Seeing white worms in a dream indicates hypocrisy and hypocrisy in matters of life. Worldly matters or matters related to religion. White worms in a dream indicate the presence of illegitimate children or symbolize the children of someone who has an enemy within. They are an indication of forbidden money such as bribery and theft, and they are a symbol of corruption. Seeing them repeatedly in a dream indicates imminent crises or disasters and portends dire consequences. These are signs that indicate the demise of... Religion, the disappearance of blessings, and the spread of evil. Seeing worms in a dream symbolizes deception and stupidity. Seeing worms in food or drink in a dream means an increase in nutrition, and it may also symbolize pregnancy or a new baby. Seeing these visions is a sign of optimism, and seeing them in a dream eating them means a lot of money and food, and on the contrary, when you see that you killed him in the dream, this indicates that he has committed sins or sins. Seeing worms in a man’s hair is a sign of anxiety or over-thinking about Worldly matters: Seeing it in the hair of a married woman means that goodness or money will come to her. Seeing it in the hair of an unmarried girl and an unmarried woman symbolizes her marriage or a short relationship with her, and it is good news that she will have many children. Seeing worms in the hair of a woman is sweet and Mahmoud, unlike seeing them in the hair of a married woman. For a man, it indicates worries and debts. Seeing worms in a dream inside the house means that there are problems in marriage or the presence of family problems, and it can also

title: Interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream, which some consider a distasteful dream, because strong winds cause damage and losses, demolish homes, remove trees from their place, and cause panic and fear among people. Explanations of this vision and its various events according to scholars. Interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin is one of the most famous interpretation scholars who established the meanings of the vision, and in this paragraph we will present to you the general effects of interpreting seeing strong winds in a dream: Seeing strong winds In a dream, it indicates a ruler or a sultan. Seeing strong winds in a dream indicates the presence of difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life and prevents him from achieving his goals, and God knows best. A strong wind in a dream indicates victory. Strong winds in a dream indicate conquering enemies and may indicate successful trade and profit. And livelihood, as the wind is linked to the pollination of plants and thus the ripening of fruits and an abundance of food, and God knows best. The dreamer seeing strong winds in his dream and that they are continuous, then this vision shows that there is someone who supports him and comforts him, and perhaps this vision shows a profit in trade and large clothes, and God knows best. Seeing strong winds. Which leads to destruction or separation between people, as it indicates the occurrence of war or strife in the place where the god resides. As for seeing strong winds in a dream that destroy houses and trees as a result, this vision means the spread of diseases and epidemics on earth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read more : Interpretation of seeing a crow in a dreamSee also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing strong winds in an unmarried girl’s dream Interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream for a single girl has many interpretations, such as seeing strong winds with dust is a disturbing vision because it indicates that the girl will face some difficulties in achieving Her desires. An unmarried girl who sees strong winds accompanied by lightning and thunder indicates that this girl will obtain a prominent position, and God knows best. But if the girl sees in her dream natural or calm winds, then this vision shows psychological stability and comfort for the girl and makes it clear that the girl is fulfilling her desires and dreams that she wants. Achieving it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. A single person’s vision of strong winds and rain indicates happy news, high grades, and excellence in his studies, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream for a married woman. Seeing strong winds in a married woman’s dream indicates... The difficulties and problems that she faces at this time or her suffering from financial hardship, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. The interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream for a married woman indicates problems between her and her husband or with her children, and God is Most High. If a woman sees strong winds with rain falling, this indicates the release of Worry and anxiety, God willing, and it may indicate her reconciliation with her husband, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. This vision also indicates the end of problems with her children and the improvement of their condition. Read more: Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream See also: Entering the police academy in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing sardines in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sardines in a dreamSardines are one of the seafood that many people may prefer to eat, in addition to many types of seafood that can be found in the markets in large numbers. They differ with regard to the details that may arise from seeing sardines in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sardines in a dream: Sardines are one of the delicious foods that can be eaten at any time and come in many different forms, and we find that sardines can be included in seafood that is beneficial to humans. Interpretation of seeing them in a dream may Indicates: Seeing the dreamer in his dream that he can catch fish is an indication that the dreamer will reap the result of his bad actions. The small sardine in its size also shows the poverty that the dreamer will fall into. A woman who dreams of eating sardines in a dream indicates the problems that she will face during childbirth. We find that she is carrying It contains many indications of the injustice that the viewer suffers from in his life. The smell of sardines also indicates the bad news that God will hear. Cleaning sardines in a dream has many connotations, the most important of which is liberating the dreamer from problems and worries in his life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of swimming in water. The sea in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sardines in a man’s dream and its meaning. One of my favorite foods from the category of men is fish of all kinds and shapes. They are found in many different types and contain many foods. Seeing them in a dream has many interpretations. The interpretation of seeing sardines for a man indicates: The commentators indicated that seeing a man For sardines, it indicates that he earned money through illegal actions. Seeing sardines for a man in a dream can portend evidence of his efforts to earn a living. Likewise, we find that the interpretation of a woman offering fish to her husband is the wife’s betrayal. Sardines in a man’s dream indicate many sins that he commits. A person in his life. Sardines can be for an unrelated man, which indicates his relationship with a girl with bad morals. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a scarf in a dream in detail. Eating sardines in a dream for a married woman. Sardines are delicious seafood that a person can eat. In general, we find many Preferred age groups. Eating sardines in a dream for a married woman refers to: Ibn Sirin explained that the wife will prepare fish for her family, indicating the problems she will face. Likewise, a woman who has been married for some time saw her sardines, indicating her delay in childbearing. Commentators interpreted the woman’s vision A married woman eats sardines as indicating her financial suffering. If a married woman eats sardines with her husband, this is a sign of an unhappy married life. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing an umbrella in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Cleaning sardines in a dream. There may be an unpleasant odor when cleaning fish, and you may also find it difficult In cleaning sardines, most women have or do not want to clean them. Cleaning sardines in a dream means: - It indicates many problems that a person will face in his life. And if he sees a woman...

title: The 100 most important interpretations of spraying water in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Splashing water in a dream, seeing one of the water splashing in someone’s dream has many meanings for the dreamer. It can bring him good news and happy news, and it can bring with it sadness, and it is interpreted according to the condition of the dreamer and the details of the vision, and we will show you all the details related to seeing water spraying in the following article. Sprinkling water in a dream Seeing water splashing in a dream has many meanings and meanings, which are: If The dreamer saw in his dream that he is sprinkling water on his body, then this is a sign that he will receive many abundant benefits and gifts in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about sprinkling water: Burial in a dream symbolizes that one of his deceased relatives wants him to pray over him and give alms on his behalf. If one sees in his dream that Sprinkling plants and crops with water and seeing them growing, this dream is praiseworthy and symbolizes the goodness of his condition and his participation in many charitable works. Seeing a person spraying water in the air is a sign that he is meaningless and putting his money in forbidden things. Sprinkling water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin explained Many connotations and concepts, the most important of which are: If one sees that he is spraying water on the road, then this vision is promising and shows that he is spending a lot for the sake of God and meeting people’s needs. If one sees in his dream that someone is spraying water on his face, then he will be able to meet all demands and ambitions. Which he has long sought to achieve in the near future. If a young man sees this dream, then this is a dream. A clear indication of the earliest date for his marriage to a suitable woman. Ibn Sirin also says that if the dreamer sees in his dream an unknown person sprinkling his face with fire water, then this dream is not good and symbolizes his falling into trouble and the emergence of sound disasters that prevent him from reaching his desired destination. Sprinkling water In a single woman’s dream, splashing water in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates many interpretations and symbols, the most important of which are: If the fortuneteller is single and faces difficulties in all aspects of her life, and she sees water splashing in a dream, positive changes will occur that will make her happy and her life peaceful and trouble-free. If she A girl is thinking about marriage and starting a new family and has certain standards for her life partner. If she sees that she is splashing water, she will meet the boy of her dreams in the near future. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a young man who is pouring water on her with pleasure, this is clear evidence that she will marry him and live with him happily and contentedly. Seeing water splashing in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes that she will achieve unparalleled success on the academic, practical, and personal levels. Interpretation of dreams about water splashing on the ground for single women. A dream about water splashing on the ground in a girl’s dream symbolizes many things, the most important of which are: If the dreamer is unmarried. A married woman sees herself sprinkling clean water without impurities on the ground, then this is clear evidence that she gives a lot of charity and extends a helping hand to the poor and needy in reality. To dream of sprinkling clean water on the ground in a girl’s dream symbolizes the coming of prosperity and abundant blessings in her life in the coming period and it will be empty. His body
